class.name: SplineIK3D
class.description: A [SkeletonModifier3D] for aligning bones on [Path3D]. The smoothness of the fitting depends on the [member Curve3D.bake_interval]. If you want [Path3D] to attach a specific bone, it is recommended to place [ModifierBoneTarget3D] before [SplineIK3D] in the [SkeletonModifier3D] list (children of the [Skeleton3D]), and then place [Path3D] as [ModifierBoneTarget3D]'s child. Bone twist is determined based on the [method Curve3D.get_point_tilt]. If the root bone joint and the start point of [Curve3D] are apart, it assumes that there is a linear line segment between them. It means that the vector pointing toward the start point of the [Curve3D] takes precedence over the shortest intersection point along the [Curve3D]. If the end bone joint exceeds the path length, bend it as close as possible to the end point of the [Curve3D].

method.name: get_path_3d
method.description: Returns the node path of the [Path3D] which is describing the path.

method.name: get_tilt_fade_in
method.description: Returns the tilt interpolation method between root bone and the start point of the [Curve3D] when they are apart. See also [method set_tilt_fade_in]

method.name: get_tilt_fade_out
method.description: Returns the tilt interpolation method between end bone and the end point of the [Curve3D] when they are apart. See also [method set_tilt_fade_out]

method.name: is_tilt_enabled
method.description: Returns the tilt property of [Curve3D] takes effect to the bone twist.

method.name: set_path_3d
method.description: Sets the node path of the [Path3D] which is describing the path.

method.name: set_tilt_enabled
method.description: Sets the tilt property of [Curve3D] takes effect to the bone twist.

method.name: set_tilt_fade_in
method.description: If [param size] is greater than [code]0[/code], the tilt is interpolated between [param size] of start bones from the start point of the [Curve3D] when they are apart. If [param size] is equal [code]0[/code], the tilts between root bone head and the start point of the [Curve3D] are unified with a tilt of the start point of the [Curve3D]. If [param size] is less than [code]0[/code], the tilts between root bone and the start point of the [Curve3D] are [code]0.0[/code].

method.name: set_tilt_fade_out
method.description: If [param size] is greater than [code]0[/code], the tilt is interpolated between [param size] of end bones from the end point of the [Curve3D] when they are apart. If [param size] is equal [code]0[/code], the tilts between end bone tail and the end point of the [Curve3D] are unified with a tilt of the end point of the [Curve3D]. If [param size] is less than [code]0[/code], the tilts between end bone and the end point of the [Curve3D] are [code]0.0[/code].
